title: User Registration with Email and Auto-Generated Password
description: Verify that a user can register using their email, the system generates a one-time password, automatically copies the credentials to clipboard, and prompts the user to save them.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter a valid email address to register.
Submit the registration form.
System generates a one-time password.
Verify the account email and generated password are automatically copied to clipboard.
Verify user is prompted to save the copied credentials.
Verify a confirmation message indicating successful registration is displayed.

title: User Login with Correct Email and Password
description: Ensure users can log in successfully using a valid registered email and correct password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a registered email address and the correct password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login is successful and user is redirected to the home page.
Verify access to the multi-dimensional investment-related psychological and ability evaluation pages.

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Validate that login attempts with a valid email but incorrect password fail and proper error is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid registered email and an incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Verify login is denied.
Check that an appropriate error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials.

title: Administrator Email Management - Add Admin Email
description: Verify that an administrator can add another administrator email via the system settings page, and the email is stored in lowercase.

steps.description: Log in as an administrator.
Navigate to the system settings admin page.
Input a valid email address (mixed case) to be added as an administrator.
Submit the new admin email.
Verify the new admin email is saved and displayed in lowercase.
Verify the added email gains administrator privileges.

title: Administrator Email Management - Blacklist Email and Restrict Login
description: Validate that blacklisted emails cannot log in to the system and are blocked upon login attempts.

steps.description: Log in as an administrator.
Navigate to the admin system settings page.
Add an email address to the blacklist in mixed case.
Verify the blacklisted email is saved in lowercase.
Log out from the administrator account.
Attempt login with the blacklisted email and any password.
Verify the login is denied with a clear access restriction message.

title: Multi-dimensional Investment Psychological and Ability Evaluation Completion and Result Generation
description: Confirm that users can complete all available psychological and investment ability tests, and the system correctly records answers and produces accurate investment strategy matches.

steps.description: Log in as a regular user.
Navigate to the Big Five personality test page.
Complete all questions in the Big Five personality test.
Navigate to risk preference, trading characteristics, and mathematical finance ability tests.
Answer all questions in each test.
Submit all test results.
Verify that all answers are accurately recorded.
Verify the system generates personalized investment strategies based on Euclidean distance algorithm.
Verify that a basic investment advice report is generated and displayed.

title: DeepSeek AI Deep Psychological Analysis Access via Payment
description: Test that users can purchase DeepSeek AI service through the payment system and that access is granted after successful payment.

steps.description: Log in as a user.
Navigate to the AI deep psychological analysis purchase page.
Initiate a payment through the order system.
Complete the payment process successfully.
Verify payment status is updated as successful.
Verify user access to AI deep psychological analysis is enabled.

title: Gift Code System - Redeem Multiple Times and Expiry Enforcement
description: Ensure the gift code system correctly supports multiple redemptions within validity period and prohibits use after expiry.

steps.description: Log in as a user.
Obtain a valid gift code with multiple use permissions and a defined expiry date in the future.
Redeem the gift code for the first time.
Verify gift code redemption is successful and relevant benefits are applied.
Redeem the same gift code a second time.
Verify the gift code redemption is successful again, confirming multiple use.
Simulate advancement of system date to past gift code expiry.
Attempt to redeem the gift code again.
Verify redemption is rejected due to expiry.

title: Payment Success Page Display and Control Switch
description: Confirm that the payment success page is displayed or suppressed according to configured control switches after order payment.

steps.description: Configure the payment success page display switch to ON.
Carry out an order payment.
Verify the payment success page is displayed after payment.
Configure the payment success page display switch to OFF.
Carry out another order payment.
Verify the payment success page is not displayed after payment.

title: Supabase Environment Variable Validation and Secure API Calls
description: Verify that the required environment variables for Supabase are properly configured and that the system securely interacts with Supabase APIs.

steps.description: Check that environment variables VITE_SUPABASE_URL and VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY are set.
Verify environment variables are non-empty and have valid format.
Attempt to initialize the Supabase client using the configured environment variables.
Verify the Supabase client initializes successfully without error.
Perform API calls requiring authentication (e.g., user login, data fetching).
Verify responses are returned securely and data integrity is maintained.

title: Frontend UI Responsiveness and Design Compliance
description: Ensure that the frontend user interface is responsive, meets the design guidelines, and React Context properly manages authentication and user state.

steps.description: Access key user flows such as login, registration, evaluation pages, and admin pages on various screen sizes.
Verify UI components adapt correctly to different screen widths and resolutions preserving usability.
Verify styling follows Tailwind CSS and Radix UI design specifications.
Perform login and logout operations.
Verify React Context updates and distributes authentication state correctly to all components.
Check transition between routes using react-router-dom.
Verify no errors or UI glitches occur during route changes.

title: Register Email Case Sensitivity and Clipboard Copy Edge Case
description: Verify that emails are treated case-insensitively at registration and that clipboard copy of credentials handles edge cases such as clipboard permission issues.

steps.description: Attempt to register with upper-case and mixed-case email versions.
Verify registration succeeds once per unique email ignoring case.
Attempt registration when clipboard permissions are denied.
Verify system provides fallback messaging to user to manually copy credentials.
